department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology
department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班

goal.en: Enhance the ability for the students to write the essay and perform the project through group discussion.
goal.ch: 透過小組的討論，增進學生們有撰寫論文及執行計畫的能力。

content.en: Assist the students to write the essay

grading.ch: “報告60％ 出席20％ 小組討論20％“

en.competency: Understand the developing history and trend of network learning
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Products/Creative Performance

en.competency: Develop the theoretical accomplishment of network learning
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Products/Creative Performance

en.competency: Develop the needed technological ability of network learning
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Products/Creative Performance

en.competency: Develop the research methodology of network learning and the ability to promote and put network learning in use
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Products/Creative Performance

en.competency: Develop the ability to create a user-friendly network learning environment
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

en.competency: Develop multi-disciplined talents with international perspective
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance

ch.competency: 認識數位學習之發展歷史與趨勢
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 作品/創作展演

ch.competency: 培養數位學習之理論素養
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 作品/創作展演

ch.competency: 培養數位學習所需之科技能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 作品/創作展演

ch.competency: 培養數位學習研究方法與推廣應用之能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 作品/創作展演

ch.competency: 培養創新設計與協調整合之能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 培養具國際觀之跨領域人才
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現

en: Department:MSc (Adult Learning) in Network Learning Technology only.
ch: 系所:限網路學習科技研究所碩士在職專班。
